In England, in the seven days to 26 January, there were 622,139 new confirmed cases (1,100.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 January, there were 626,521 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 1% (4,382 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 January is 14,845,382 (26,251.7 cases per 100,000 population).
